title: MobileNet for Traffic Object Detection
description: Traffic object detection model designed for embedded hardware
long_description: MobileNet is a lightweight deep learning model designed for efficient on-device vision applications. It has been optimized for speed and low power consumption, making it suitable for embedded hardware. The model has been pretrained and adapted for detecting various traffic objects, including vehicles, pedestrians, and cyclists.

links.label: Model Zoo
links.heading: Model Zoo for AURIX™
links.sub-heading: Find your tools & Learn about getting started with developing Edge AI for AURIX™

title: MobileNet for Weather Classification
description: Weather classification model designed for embedded hardware
long_description: MobileNet is a lightweight deep learning model designed for efficient on-device vision applications. It has been optimized for speed and low power consumption, making it suitable for embedded hardware. The model has been pretrained. Using transfer learning it has been adapted for detecting rain drops indicating rainy vs clear weather.
